mapper.sql: id, type, season2, season3, season4, name, phone_staff_id, receiver_staff_id, business_phone, receiver_staff_date, phone, visit_date, area, phone2, relation_id, qq, msn, site, id_card, product, transaction_amount, call_dates ,gift, recent_visit_date, recent_export_date, blacklist_flag, update_date, update_flag
mapper.update: update customer_info set receiver_staff_name = CONCAT(ifnull(receiver_staff_name,''),#{condition.receptionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), receiver_staff_date = CONCAT(ifnull(receiver_staff_date,''),#{condition.receptionDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) where id =#{condition.cid,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
mapper.select:
select count(1) as total_counts, (select count(1) from customer_info c
and c.area = '1') as dl_counts, (select count(1) from customer_info c
and c.area = '0') as sy_counts from customer_info c

select distinct (select count(1) as locked_counts from customer_info c
and c.type = '4') as '锁定', (select count(1) as locked_counts from customer_info c
and c.type = '3') as '成单', (select count(1) as locked_counts from customer_info c
and c.type = '5') as '转介绍', (select count(1) as locked_counts from customer_info c
and c.type = '2') as '说明会', (select count(1) as locked_counts from customer_info c
and c.type = '1') as '重复' from customer_info

select c.id, c.`name`, (CASE c.area WHEN '1' THEN '大连' WHEN '0' THEN '沈阳' END) as area, (CASE c.sex WHEN '1' THEN '男' WHEN '0' THEN '女' END) as sex, c.type, c.vip_card from customer_info c
order by ${orderByClause}
select id, phone, call_dates from customer_info
